name: Berry Farm
description:
This game was made in 48 hours as part of the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam in July 2017 by Chionic and Olegkuv. It was made in the Unity Game Engine, personal edition. All code, graphics, music and other assets are either open source (see the credits page in game for details) or made by Olegkuv and Chionic.

An updated version of this game including a shop and difficulty settings was released on 21/10/2017. The original game jam version can still be played by downloading 'berryFarm.zip'. For the new version, play online or download 'berryFarm2.0.zip'
